Emergency has been declared at the state level regarding ice storm. $4.5 million of damage is the threshold to get a federal disaster declaration. All counties must declare damages. This includes Hinds County and the water crisis. FEMA will be here in Mar 9 to do assessments.
Jackson Water Crisis: Governor says he has texted back and forth with mayor of Jackson on water issues. Members of his administration have also communicated with the city.
